synopsis.text: Miraâ€™s ascension to the throne of Vespania is threatened by a sinister plot, drawing the attention of the world's greatest detective, Conan Edogawa, and master thief, Lupin III. After a chance encounter in Japan, Mira switches places with her look-alike, Ran, who is unwittingly transported to Vespania with Conan and others in pursuit. Meanwhile, Lupin has his eyes set on the royal treasure, the Queen's Crown, and infiltrates the palace with his partner, Jigen. As Conan investigates the mysterious deaths of the queen and prince, he must also protect Mira and Ran from danger. With the future of Vespania hanging in the balance, a thrilling showdown between Conan and Lupin is inevitable. Will Conan uncover the truth and safeguard the princesses, or will Lupin claim his prize and escape once again?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
